mapper.select: select article.*, tag.* from article, tag, article_tag_ref as atr where article.article_status = 1 and article.article_id = atr.article_id and tag.tag_id = atr.tag_id order by article_id DESC
select article.*, tag.* from article, tag, article_tag_ref as atr where article.article_id = #{articleId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and article.article_id = atr.article_id and tag.tag_id = atr.tag_id
select article.*, tag.* from article, tag, article_tag_ref as atr where article.article_id = atr.article_id and tag.tag_id = atr.tag_id and tag.tag_id = 4 order by article_id DESC

select article.*, tag.* from article, tag, article_tag_ref as atr where tag.tag_id = #{tagId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and article.article_id = atr.article_id and tag.tag_id = atr.tag_id order by article.article_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into article(article_author_id, article_title, article_content, article_status, article_create_time, article_update_time, article_summary, has_pic, first_pic_url, is_error) values (#{articleAuthorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{articleTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{articleStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{articleCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{articleUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{articleSummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hasPic,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{firstPicUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isError,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.select: select count(*) from article where article_status = 1
select sum(article_view_count) from article where article_status = 1
select sum(article_comments_count) from article where article_status = 1
select * from (select * from article order by article_id desc limit #{pageIndex},#{pageSize}) a left join article_tag_ref atr on a.article_id = atr.article_id left join tag on tag.tag_id = atr.tag_id

select article.*, tag.* from article, tag, article_tag_ref as atr where article.article_id < #{articleId} and article_status = 1 and article.article_id = atr.article_id and tag.tag_id = atr.tag_id order by article.article_id desc limit 1
